body.name: Pillow Cube Side Cube - Most Popular (5”) Bed Pillows for Sleeping on Your Side, Cooling Memory Foam Pillow Support Head & Neck for Pain Relief - King, Queen, Twin 24"x12"x5"
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 37 mins
features: SUPPORT YOUR NECK AND SHOULDERS - There’s a gap between your neck and shoulder which most conventional pillows won’t fill. Pillow Cube gives you support for your “pillow hole” which can alleviate neck pain or shoulder pain caused by unsupportive or thin pillows. Stop folding or bunching up pillows and try the pillow designed with you in mind.
COMFORTABLE - Fluffy soft core. Get your head in the clouds with this dreamy cuboidal pillow.

BETTER SLEEP ON YOUR SIDE - Side sleep is healthier for you and is proven to help with circulation, respiration, and digestion. Pillow Cube is the pillow created specifically to support side sleepers in their search for a better night’s sleep.

SIZE MATTERS - The 5” Thick Pillow Cube Pro is our most popular pillow. This is the ideal thickness for most people. If you are between 5'3" and 6'3" this pillow will most likely work for you. But if you are still unsure please check out the image and the sizing video to see how you can best determine the size you need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Perfect Shape The cube shape perfectly fits in and supports the 90° space between your head and neck, aligning your spine. Aligns Your Spine “Normal” looking pillows are just the worst. They don’t give you the support you need. The pillow cube is designed to align your spine by supporting both your head and your neck. Soft & Supportive Our proprietary Cooling Memory Core is made of high-quality viscoelastic foam that fills the space between your head and shoulders while still being soft enough to cradle you to sleep. Perfect For Spooning The Pillow Cube Pro is the perfect size for beds and spooning. Three Different Sizes The Pro fits every body type. It's 24 inches long and 12 inches wide. It comes in three different heights; 4 inches, 5 inches, and 6 inches. Meet The Family The Pro is great for people who roll from side to side during the night or who want a pillow that covers their bed like a traditional pillow. The smaller Classic is great for travel and naps.

Which size is right for me? 4 inch Pillow 5 inch Pillow 6 inch Pillow Use if you're 5'6" or shorter Works best for slender side sleepers who have more narrow shoulders. Use if between 5'7" & 6'3" *Most Popular Size* This size fits most side sleepers' shoulder gap. Use if you're 6'4" or taller For sizable side sleepers who have broad shoulders or need higher support. Firm Mattress If you need a 4" pillow and your mattress is firm, consider a 5" pillow Firm Mattress If you need a 5" pillow but your mattress is firm, consider a 6" pillow Firm Mattress If you need a 6" pillow but your mattress is firm, stay with the 6" pillow Soft Mattress If you need a 4" pillow but your mattress is soft, stay with the 4" pillow Soft Mattress If you need a 5" pillow but your mattress is soft, consider a 4" pillow Soft Mattress If you need a 6" pillow but your mattress is soft, consider a 5" pillow Still not sure? See our sizing video guide at top of page Still not sure? See our sizing video guide at top of page Still not sure? See our sizing video guide at top of page

How do I know which size to order? Stack books on your mattress until the height feels comfortable. Measure the height. Order a pillow 1” thicker than the books. What if I sleep on my back? While the Pillow Cube was specifically designed for side sleepers, we have heard from some side/back sleepers that they enjoy the pillow too and that they toss back and forth less on the cube. But all in all, the pillow is intended for side sleepers. What is in the foam? Our high-quality foam is made of viscoelastic polyurethane. What is the standard pillowcase & cover made from? The pillowcase is made out of polyester and spandex. The quilted cover is made from polyester.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good Pillow
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great shape, thickness, and softness. I have c-spine and shoulder issues. I kept seeing this pillow in my social media algorithms (because our phones do listen to us). I decided to try it - and a month out, I do believe it’s a good pillow and worth it.The complaint I’ve seen about the glue/chemical smell - I promise you the smell will dissipate after a few days of airing out. Put it outside and/or put a fan on it and that may speed it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy! I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I got this in the mail yesterday and was very excited to sleep on it... And after the best sleep I've had in literal years... I LOVE THIS PILLOW! I can breathe so much better sleeping on this pillow than any other I've ever bought! To the point my family can't hear me snoring. It's very supportive yet soft and fluffy! I have even bought pillows in this price point that don't compare in the least! It's well worth the price for sure!!It does fit a standard pillow case by the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too soft, but still worth it
reviews.reviewText: I expected it to be firmer, but I'm still pleased with it. I'm 5'2 with broad shoulders and am a religious side sleeper who'd been struggling with shoulder pain while sleeping. It's helped my shoulder pain, but I do wish it was a little firmer to help my neck a little more. My husband is 6 ft - also a side sleeper- and it's almost too soft and short for him. We fold a blanket up under each of ours to boost them up a bit more and that helps. If it was another inch or two taller and firmer, it'd be perfect. Still better than most pillows- even the cervical pillows we've used for the last 3 years- but be warned it may not be enough of a fix for broad shouldered side sleepers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite pillow.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a pillow that is firm, cooling and provides the right amount of support for side sleeping. I thought a cube shaped pillow would be a gimmick but after watching their video, i decided to give it a try because it looked like it actually could do what they say it does. I ordered my pillow and it came flattened and vacuum sealed. After removing it from the vacuum seal, it plumped immediately. It did have a slight chemically smell but that dissipated quickly. After two nights sleeping with the pillow I realized I had ordered the wrong size for my height. I ordered regular size for individuals over 5’ 3”. I am 5’1” and I found that the pillow was too thick so I wasn’t getting the proper alignment. So when you order, be sure to make sure you order the correct size pillow for the height/size. I sized down to the thin, which turned out to be perfect. Upon opening the pillow, I did feel like the thin wasn’t has firm as the standard but it turned out to be fine. The pillow looks like a cute rectangular block. The pillow casing is very soft and cool to the touch. I will say that the pillow does stay cool for a very long time. When I’m ready to sleep, I tuck the pillow between my shoulder against my neck. Once I lay my head down on the cool pillow, I fall asleep pretty fast. The pillow is comfortable and most importantly, the firmness is giving me the proper support to keep my spine aligned. So far I’ve been sleeping on this pillow for about a month and I really love it. Most pillows lose their firmness and therefore lose the head and neck support. I have high hopes that this pillow will remain firm for a long time. I’ll try to remember to do an update after 6 months of using this pillow. For now, it’s definitely a recommend from me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will expand and smell
reviews.reviewText: The box pillow came in a 'small' box. It is a foam cube inside of a pillow case with zipper. After un wrappiig the plastic around the rolled up deflated pillow it will take on air and expand to the pillows intended size. What I noticed right afer this enlargement was a smell kind of like a hobby glue or maybe turpentine (we all smell things differently) that permeated the pillow cover which was around the foam. Took off the pillow case and discovered that the smell was coming from the foam inside. What to do. Return means findiing a larger box.So went to the product makers website through Amazon and this is some of the Chat, like chat because it gives a text to refer to at a later time. The answer shown here, surrounded by """, was right away so this situation must exist with other purchasers:""" System (Pillow Cube)Nov 3, 2023, 12:36 PM MDT(12:34:19 PM) *** John joined the chat ***(12:34:20 PM) John: Just opened up a pillow cube ordered through Amazon. Why does it smell. Washing out cover but the smell comes from the foam insert. Not wanting to sleep with the pillow if it continues to smell like a hobby glue.(12:34:45 PM) Aly: Hey John,All of the foam we use is of the highest quality. We've seen that if the pillow is packaged quickly after the foam is made, it will have a stronger smell.Luckily, the smell WILL go away. The easiest way to speed up that process is by setting the foam core out in the sun in the open air until the smell has dissipated. We'd also recommend washing the pillowcase and pillow cover. """After two weeks of putting the foam out in the sun and later letting it sit out in the garage and then later in the house there is still a slight lingering smell. The pillow case hand washed out the smell after a couple of washes. Have not used the pillow as of this writing.Not sure what will do ultimately but wanted to pass on this information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to give in 5 stars
reviews.reviewText: I'll start by saying the pillow is comfortable. However it doesn't stay in place. All night long it slips out from under my head. It creeps up my head board or just to the side of my head. I have woken up several nights with neck pain and headaches because it moves. I'm keeping it and using it in the couch because it is a nice pillow. It would have been perfect if it was heavier and about 3 inches thicker .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pillow is large and comfortable. I like that it comes with a pillow case to protect your pillow. The case is easy to remove and wash. I slept great! As a side sleeper this is a must have.
A friend told me about this pillow and I absolutely LOVE this pillow.I have a sore neck often and this pillow really supports my neck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I tried this pillow for several nights and have had to switch back to my old pillow.this thing is huge and hard as a rock, even on my side i have to sleep with my head angled up because it has no give.
My mum has arthritis in her neck and even though this pillow is great quality, it didn't help elevate her neck pain.

Pillow cube has quite literally changed my life.I have had neck pain for the past 10 years and have tried probably 20 pillows before pillow cube. None of them compare to this fantastic product. It is firm but soft and gives the perfect amount of support. I have seen an improvement in neck pain from using it for only 2 weeks.Thank you pillow cube, you’re the best!!!!!
Hestitant as probably everyone is when one first looks at the Cube's design but I got to say I love it so far.
